viewData.name: Microsoft 13.5" Surface Book 2 Multi-Touch 2-in-1 Notebook (Silver)
viewData.short_description: Buy Microsoft 13.5" Surface Book 2 Multi-Touch 2-in-1 Notebook (Silver) featuring 1.7 GHz Intel Core i5-8350U Quad-Core, 8GB of RAM | 256GB SSD 13.5" 3000 x 2000 PixelSense Display. Review Microsoft Book 2
viewData.long_description: The silver Microsoft 13.5" Surface Book 2 Multi-Touch 2-in-1 Notebook is a high-performance laptop/tablet hybrid with power and versatility.
